key.name: automount-manager
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used to automount removable media.

key.name: desktop-background
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used to draw desktop background.

key.name: display-config
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used to provide display configuration.

key.name: end-session-dialog
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used to show end session dialog.

key.name: idle-monitor
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used for user activity monitoring.

key.name: sound-applet
key.description: If set to true, then GNOME Flashback application will be used to show sound applet. This is same sound applet that used to be part of GNOME Control Center.

key.name: fade
key.description: If set to true, then fade effect will be used to change the desktop background.
